latex: In convex quadrilateral $ABCD$ we have $AB=15$, $BC=16$, $CD=12$, $DA=25$, and $BD=20$. Let $M$ and $\gamma$ denote the circumcenter and circumcircle of $\triangle ABD$. Line $CB$ meets $\gamma$ again at $F$, line $AF$ meets $MC$ at $G$, and line $GD$ meets $\gamma$ again at $E$. Determine the area of pentagon $ABCDE$.
